The object connecting the plane to the tunnel is a jet bridge, also known as an airbridge, boarding bridge, or jetway. It is a movable, enclosed bridge that connects the airplane to the airport terminal, allowing passengers to board and disembark without having to go outside.

The object connecting the plane to the tunnel is a jet bridge, also known as an air bridge, boarding bridge, or passenger boarding bridge. It is a movable, telescopic corridor that allows passengers to board and disembark an aircraft without having to go outside.
